  • Changelog

    Chojnacky (1988)

    chojnacky_1988.Rd

    Allometric models from Chojnacky (1988)

    Stem Volume Models

    vsa = beta_0 + beta_1 * X + beta_2 * X^2

    • vsa [ft3] - volume of the entire stem, including top and stump

    • dsoc [in] - diameter outside bark above the root collar

    • hst [ft] - total height of the stem

    Model Parameters

       species_group X_threshold single_stem family       genus     species      beta_0 beta_1 beta_2
 1 juniper       <= 6        FALSE       Cupressaceae Juniperus osteosperma  -0.129   2.03  0.101

    vsa = beta_3 + beta_1 * X + beta_4/X

    • vsa [ft3] - volume of the entire stem, including top and stump

    • dsoc [in] - diameter outside bark above the root collar

    • hst [ft] - total height of the stem

    Model Parameters
